mapper.insert: insert into review values(#{res_name}, #{menu}, #{rating}, #{rev_content}, sysdate, review_no.nextval, #{userid})
mapper.update: update review set rating=#{rating}, menu=#{menu}, rev_content=#{rev_content} where review_no = #{review_no}
update restaurant rt set rt.rating = (select round(avg(r.rating),1) from review r where r.res_name = rt.res_name) where rt.res_name = #{res_name}
